Collaborative Research on African Mental Health

version_statement.version_notes: NIDS-CRAM combines NIDS longitudinal data with mental health modules across 5 waves

title_statement.title: NIDS-CRAM Waves 1-5: National Income Dynamics Study with Mental Health Module

study_info.abstract: NIDS-CRAM integrates comprehensive mental health assessments into the NIDS longitudinal household survey across five waves (2020-2021). The study examines the relationship between socioeconomic factors and mental health outcomes in South Africa, including depression, anxiety, and psychological distress among household members.
study_info.geog_coverage: Nationally representative NIDS sample with mental health module implemented across all nine provinces
study_info.analysis_unit: Individual household members with mental health assessments
study_info.data_kind: Longitudinal panel survey with mental health clinical scales
study_info.universe: NIDS household members aged 18+ years assessed for mental health outcomes across COVID-19 pandemic waves
